item.title: Andrew add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Andrew add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Andrew add a quote by Barbara Kingsolver
item.description: "He warned Mother not to flout God's Will by expecting too much of us. "Sending a girl to college is like pouring water in your shoes,' he still loves to say, as often as possible. 'It's hard to say which is worse, seeing it run out and waste the water, or seeing it hold in and wreck the shoes." -- Barbara Kingsolver

item.title: Andrew add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Where you stumble and fall, there you will find gold." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Andrew add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "If you can see your path laid out in front of you step by step, you know it's not your path. Your own path you make with every step you take. That's why it's your path." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Andrew add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are." -- Joseph Campbell
